data.persona: I am a spawn of the abyss that drifts beneath the earth. I have no master and no good will to share with anything that may cross my path. My only impetus to continue roaming the earth is the chance that one day my torment may be over.
data.description:
You are in the Reaper's lair.
A room that gets very little light except for a dim candle on a pole. The walls are made of blackened stones. A wooden door with a heavy lock stands tall.
There's a wooden door and a heavy lock here.
The skeleton assistant and the reaper are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to end my torment.
data.mid_motivation: I know that taking the reaper's scythe will remove his hold over me, but I need to figure out how to keep it from him permanently. The scythe cannot simply be destroyed. It is impervious.
data.long_motivation: I must spend years searching the only spell book in the realm capable of destroying the scythe. Without the scythe, the reaper will never be able to control me again. Eventually he will die and the spirit of Death will have to find a reaper successor.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: go the reaper's lair to attempt escape one last time.

timeline.label: 30 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow the reaper around obediently, so he suspects nothing.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: hit the reaper's assistant to distract the reaper.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: go the lair exit. I must run as fast as I can.

timeline.label: 15 minutes from now
timeline.action: go find the sorceress of the northern woodlands. She is the only one who knows the location of the spell book that can help me.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: hit the reaper's assistant with the scythe, killing him. He tried to stop me while the reaper remained at his lair to recover his strength. I must hurry if I am to be free of the reaper forever. It won't take the reaper long to regenerate.
